      Constructors in entities with parameters of type Relation 
      Constructor and Description
      Tuple(double[] values_list, double tuple_cost, Relation rel)
      Constructs a tuple based on a given list of values for the attributes
      CAUTION: The object will contain a reference to the passed list of values No deep copy is made
      Tuple(List<Tuple> list_of_tuples, Relation rel)
      Constructs a new tuple by concatenating a list of other tuples The cost of the new tuple is an aggregation of the other costs
